actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: On 17 January 2023, the Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov attacked 2 journalists of the Russian NTV channel in Melitopol, Zaporizhia. The journalists were beaten; the female-reporter also suffered sexual violence.
Around 9 January 2023 (week of), a Russian soldier raped an underage girl in Melitopol, Zaporizhia region. There is no indication that he was held responsible for the offence.

Around 30 August 2022 (week of), a Russian soldier offered help to a civilian family who ran out of fuel and was stuck on the road near Izium, Kharkiv, lured them into his yard, injured the man and attempted to rape the woman.
On 21 August 2022, a Russian soldier reportedly attempted to rape a Ukrainian girl in the street in Melitopol, Zaporizhia. However, he was reportedly stopped by Ukrainian civilians who attacked him.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: Around 28 July 2022, a Russian soldier of the Kadyrov's Chechen Battalion castrated and then shot dead a captured Ukrainian soldier near a sanatorium in the area of Pryvillia, Luhansk. The videos of torture first appeared on a pro-Russian Telegram channel on 28 July.
Around 20 July 2022 (between 13 - 27 July), a Russian soldier or a group of soldiers raped and killed 8 civilian women in Luhansk, Luhansk region.

Around 13 July 2022 (between 27 June - 27 July), a 13-years-old girl was raped and killed in Melitopol, Zaporizhia region. The body was found on July 27. The victim's family suspects Russian soldiers.
Around 10 July 2022 (week of), Russian soldiers abducted a woman in Izium, Kharkiv region, tortured her with electric current and repeatedly raped her, while holding in captivity for 10 days.

source: HRW; Kharkiv Human Rights Protection Group
notes: Around 1 July 2022 (beginning of month), Russian forces illegally detained, tortured and raped for 10 days a female civilian in Izium, Kharkiv region. She was later released. Her husband was also detained and tortured.
Around 1 July 2022 (week of), Russian forces detained a woman in Izium, Kharkiv region, and held her captive for 10 days, subjecting her to rape and electric shocks.
On 15 June 2022, Russian soldier raped a woman in occupied Mykhailivka, Zaporizhia.
On 6 June 2022, a Russian serviceman raped a Ukrainian woman in Berdiansk, Zaporizhia region.
Around 15 May 2022 (month of), Russian forces several times raped Ukrainian children in Kherson region. At least three children died as a result of the sexual violence. Further casualties unknown.
Around 15 May 2022 (month of), 2 Russian soldiers abducted and raped a Ukrainian civilian woman in Tokmak district (coded to Tokmak, Zaporizhia region).
Around 4 May 2022 (as reported), 3 to 5 Russian soldiers raped a 14-year-old girl in front of her mother in the Kyiv oblast.
Around 4 May 2022 (as reported), a Russian officer repeatedly raped a female teacher and kept her as a sex slave in Kherson, Kherson. The officer threatened her family if she did not cooperate.
Around 27 April 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers raped an 11-year-old girl in an unspecified location in the Buchanskyi district, Kyiv. (coded to Bucha, Kyiv)
Around 25 April 2022 (as reported), Russian forces raped a woman in Orlianske, Zaporizhia.
Around 22 April 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers raped a man in the Bucha district, Kyiv.

Around 22 April 2022 (as reported), somewhere in the Kherson oblast, Russian soldiers raped a female local government worker in order to force her to cooperate. The perpetrators threatened that they would rape her again if she does not cooperate.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: Around 15 April 2022 (month of), 3 Russian servicemen raped a Ukrainian civilian woman in one of the Kharkiv region settlements occupied at that moment (coded to Kharkiv, Kharkiv region).

Around 4 April 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers raped a three-year-old girl in Mykolaiv region. She was was found dead with signs of rape on 4 April. This was reported by the Ukrainian Ambassador to Estonia.

Around 4 April 2022, Russian soldiers dragged out an unspecified number of women out of their shelters and raped them in Brovary, Kyiv. The soldiers also looted and beat residents. This incident was reported by a Ukrainian woman who had recently fled the city. The woman also reported that some of the women who had been raped were then found hanged. It is unclear whether they were killed or whether they committed suicide. Unspecified fatalities coded as 3.
Around 3 April 2022, an unspecified number of Russian soldiers raped and killed a woman in the district of Mariupol, Donetsk.
On 3 April 2022, two Russian soldiers raped at gunpoint a woman inside her residence in Kherson, Kherson, after a local resident identified her as the wife of a Ukrainian soldier.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

actor1: Military Forces of Ukraine (2019-) Territorial Defense Forces
notes: Around 3 April 2022, a member of the Ukrainian territorial defence sexually assaulted a teacher in Vinnytsia, as he tried dragging her into the school library and tried to rape her. The perpetrator has been arrested.
Around 2 April 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers raped and killed a girl in Mariupol, Donetsk. This incident was reported on 2 April 2022 by a friend of the girl.
Around 30 March 2022, Russian soldiers repeatedly raped and killed a woman in front of her son in the Mariupol district, Donetsk.

Around 30 March 2022, three Russian soldiers from a tank unit abducted and raped a 16-year-old girl (likely near Bucha, Kyiv). This incident was reported by the Ukrainian Security Service (SBU) who intercepted a phone call between a Russian soldier and a woman in Russia.
Around 30 March 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers forced to undress and beat an unspecified number of female and male civilians hiding in a basement in Irpin, Kyiv.

Around 27 March 2022, on a highway 20km outside Kyiv, in the Bucha district, the bodies of three women were found naked and partially burned. This event occurred whilst the area was under Russian occupation and was reported on 3 April 2022, once the area was liberated.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: On 26 March 2022, a Russian soldier, likely a Kadyrov's fighter, raped a 19-year-old girl hiding in the basement of a building near Mariupol, Donetsk.

Around 20 March 2022 (between 10 March - 31 March), Russian soldiers were residing in a civilian house in a village in Chernihiv region (coded to Chernihiv, Chernihiv region) for 3 weeks, while one of the soldiers was sexually assaulting a 16-year-old girl in that household. Her relatives were also threatened and physically assaulted.
Around 19 March 2022 (as reported), 1n Kyiv Oblast, Russian soldiers raped and held hostage for 10 days a 15-year-old girl in Vorzel, Kyiv. The attack was filmed by the soldiers on a mobile phone.

Around 17 March 2022 (week of), a Ukrainian woman disappeared in Bucha, Kyiv region, during the occupation of the settlement by Russian forces. She was found dead, shot in the head by Russian soldiers. She has also been raped.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), a Russian soldier repeatedly raped a 29-year-old woman in Kharkiv region, and killed her old mother, when the daughter refused to go to Russia with the soldier.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), five Russian soldiers raped a 20-year-old woman in Irpin, Kyiv.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian soldiers raped a 11-year-old boy in Bucha, Kyiv.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian forces captured and abducted a woman and her daughter in Balakliia, Kharkiv region. The daughter was raped while the woman was abused by Russian forces.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), a Russian soldier raped a pregnant woman in the Kyiv region (coded to Kyiv, Kyiv). As a result, the woman lost her child.

Around 15 March 2022 (month of), according to a local NGO, Russian soldiers sexually assaulted at least 50 women near Irpin, Kyiv. This incident was reported on 22 April 2022 and likely occurred in March 2022 whilst the area was under Russian occupation

Around 15 March 2022 (month of), in an unspecified location in Kyiv Oblast (coded to Bucha), a volunteer helping evacuate residents in the area reported three naked women emerging from houses and basements. One of the women was badly beaten and had bone fractures, and was taken away by ambulance. The volunteer also reported witnessing about 10 other women giving statements to police about being raped. This incident occurred whilst the area was under Russian occupation and was reported on 1 April 2022 after the area was liberated.

Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian soldiers raped and killed an unspecified number of women in Bucha, Kyiv. The women's bodies were found burned. This incident occurred in March 2022 whilst the town was under Russian occupation and was reported on 3 April 2022. Unspecified fatalities coded as 3.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian soldiers raped three women in front of their children in Lubyanka, Kyiv.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), three Russian soldiers raped a woman at gunpoint, in front of her three-year-old son, in Zdvyzhivka, Kyiv.

Around 15 March 2022, Russian soldiers tortured and raped a 22-year-old woman, dragging her into a yard close to her residence in Bucha, Kyiv. The woman, another woman, and a man who attempted to help the woman were shot and killed by Russian soldiers. The victims' bodies were left in their yard for at least 10 days. This incident occurred in mid-March whilst the area was under Russian occupation and was reported on 22 April 2022, after the woman's body was found in a mass grave.
Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian forces raped a 78-year-old woman in the Kherson region. (coded to Kherson city as the exact location is unknown)

Around 15 March 2022 (month of), Russian soldiers held captive and repeatedly raped 25 girls and women aged between 14 and 24, in a basement in Bucha, Kyiv. The women reported that the soldiers told them they would rape them to prevent them from having Ukrainian children. Nine of the women got pregnant. This incident was reported by Lyudmyla Denisova, the Ukrainian Parliament's Human Rights Commissioner on 6 April 2022. This incident occurred in March 2022 whilst the town was under Russian occupation.

Around 13 March 2022 (as reported), an unspecified number of soldiers raped a 15-year-old girl and her mother in Irpin, Kyiv. The event was reported on 4 April 2022 by a Ukrainian refugee who had recently fled the city. The event occurred in March 2022 whilst the town was under Russian occupation.

Around 13 March 2022 (as reported), Russian soldiers raped a 9-year-old girl inside her residence in Bucha, Kyiv, whilst her mother went out for water. A woman who tried to rescue the girl was beaten by the soldiers.
Around 13 March 2022 (as reported), three Russian soldiers raped a woman in Irpin, Kyiv. This event was reported on 8 April 2022.
Around 13 March 2022, a Russian soldier kidnapped a woman from her residence and raped her in an abandoned building around Hostomel, Kyiv.

Around 13 March 2022, a Russian soldier raped and strangled a 16-year-old girl, who was six months pregnant, in the Kherson oblast. He also threatened to kill her and bring '20 more people', if she did not do as he wanted. The soldier was allegedly from Donetsk and was called 'Blue' by other soldiers. The girl reported that the soldier was drunk at the time of the attack and that the other soldier who was also there warned the soldier against raping the girl.

Around 13 March 2022, Russian soldiers raped a 15-year-old and 16-year-old girl in Ivankiv, Kyiv, according to the deputy mayor of the town. This incident occurred in March 2022 whilst the area was under Russian occupation.

Around 13 March 2022 (as reported), two children under the age of 10 were reportedly found dead with signs of rape and torture in Irpin, Kyiv. This incident was reported by Lyudmyla Denisova, Ombudsman for Human Rights in Ukraine on 5 April and likely occurred in March 2022 whilst the town was under Russian occupation.

On 13 March 2022, a Russian soldier raped a woman multiple times at gunpoint in Mala Rohan, Kharkiv, after entering the school where she and her family were sheltering in along with around 40 other IDPs, mostly women and girls. The soldier beat her and cut her face, neck and hair with a knife.
Around 9 March 2022, an unidentified perpetrator raped a 11-year-old girl in Hostomel, Kyiv. This incident likely took place under Russian occupation.

Around 9 March 2022, Russian soldiers raped a woman in the Bucha district, Kyiv. This incident is likely to have occurred sometime in March whilst the area was under Russian occupation. This incident was reported on 22 April 2022.
Around 9 March 2022, seven Russian soldiers raped a woman near Irpin, Kyiv, forcing other Ukrainian detainees to watch. This incident was reported on 22 April 2022.

Around 9 March 2022, three Russian soldiers beat, raped, and killed a 15-year-old girl and her mother in Irpin, Kyiv, while forcing another 17-year-old girl to watch. The survivor girl said that soldiers told her to pass on the story. This incident occurred whilst the city was still under Russian occupation.

On 9 March 2022, two Russian soldiers raped two women near Bucha, Kyiv. The soldiers broke into the women's residence and took them to an abandoned house where the soldiers assaulted the women. One of the women reported being forced to knock on residents' houses in order to find other women.

On 9 March 2022, two Russian soldiers, including a commander, repeatedly raped at gunpoint a woman inside her home in Brovary, Kyiv. Her husband had been shot and killed earlier and her four-year-old child was threatened. One of the soldiers has been identified and a warrant for his arrest has been issued. The other soldier has not yet been identified. The commander has also been accused of multiple other rapes.
Around 9 March 2022, Russian soldiers tortured, raped and killed two women, including a doctor, near Hostomel, Kyiv.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: Around 9 March 2022, a 34-year-old woman reported witnessing Kadyrovites raping and hanging her neighbours, a 16-year-old girl and a 48-year-old woman, likely in the Bucha district, Kyiv. The woman reported the incident to a psychologist and said she was not raped herself. This incident occurred in March whilst the area was under Russian occupation.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: Around 9 March 2022, Kadyrov's Chechen soldiers sexually abused a 15-year-old girl and her mother near Irpin, Kyiv. This incident was reported on 22 April 2022.
On 8 March 2022, a Russian soldier, commander at that time, raped a woman in Kalyta, Kyiv, when the village was occupied by Russian forces. This event was reported on 4 April 2022.

assoc_actor_1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: On 7 March 2022, Russian soldiers, including Russian Chechen fighters, raped a woman in Kyiv region and killed her husband.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: On 7 March 2022, a Kadyrov's soldier raped and killed a woman near Romanivka, Kyiv. The woman was taken from her home and taken to a nearby abandoned home. The woman was buried in the garden of the house by Russian soldiers who found her body.

actor1: Military Forces of Russia (2000-) Chechen Battalion of Ramzan Kadyrov
notes: On 7 March 2022, a Kadyrov's soldier threatened and raped at gunpoint a woman near Irpin, Kyiv. The woman reported that four other soldiers entered whilst she was being attacked and took the solider away. The woman's husband was shot and killed after attempting to stop the soldier.

Around 4 March 2022, Russian forces raped and killed a 17-year-old girl around Kherson, after they occupied the city on 1 March. This incident was reported by a local woman living in the city during a broadcast with CNN.

On 4 March 2022, Russian soldiers raped a 40-year-old woman and her 17-year-old daughter around Kherson. The woman and her daughter reported attending rallies against the Russian occupation of the city where they encountered psychological and physical abuse from Russian soldiers.

Around 1 March 2022, a Russian soldier raped a 31-year-old woman inside her home near Bashtanka, Mykolaiv. She and her child were also threatened with violence. The soldier was allegedly carrying out filtering measures and checking all the residents of the village.
On 28 February 2022, a Russian soldier raped a 28-year-old woman in Bucha, Kyiv.
Around 13 October 2021, a police officer and a former police officer raped a woman in Chevelcha, Poltava. The woman was hospitalised.
Around 23 November 2020, two police officers raped and threw a woman out of a window in Stryi, Lviv. [Coded according to the victim's version].

actor1: NAF: United Armed Forces of Novorossiya
notes: On 1 June 2020, a member of the DPR rebel forces reportedly raped and killed a civilian woman in Horlivka, Donetsk.

On 23 May 2020, two police officers beat, raped, strangled and shot a pistol over the head of a civilian woman who had been called to the police department as a witness in Kaharlyk, Kiev. The police officers are also accused of beating a civilian man the same night.
On 30 April 2020, five people met through a dating app a transgender woman in Zhytomyr region, then violently beat and raped her.

actor1: NAF: United Armed Forces of Novorossiya
notes: As reported on 8 August, several NAF rebels beat and raped a civilian woman in the area of Donetsk city.

On 15 May 2019, police officers tortured with electricity, beat and strangled a man in a police department in Kharkiv in an attempt to extract a confession. Part of the torture was performed on the victim's genitals.
On 20 April 2019, according to Lugansk Media Centre, two Ukrainian servicemen threatened with a weapon and raped a civilian woman in Nyzhnyoteple, Luhansk.

assoc_actor_1: Police Forces of Ukraine (2014-2019) Prison Guards; Prisoners (Ukraine)
notes: As reported on 7 March, a former Ukrainian soldier who fought in Donbass was raped by his inmates in a corrective colony in Berdiansk, Zaporizhia. According to a Human Rights Information report the attackers were instructed to do so by the administration of the colony. On the next day, the victim was pressured by law enforcers to write a statement that he has no claims against the police and military prosecution.

On Dec. 20 2018, policemen arrested four women, two of whom were pregnant. According to their attorney, the police took the women in a separate room near the Politekhnichnyi Institut metro station in Kiev, stripped them to underwear and threatened them with rape. Then one of the policemen started beating the women with a baton.

On 5 March 2018, three minors killed a gay person in Mykolaiv. Three residents of Luhansk region, age from 16 to 17, found a male LGBT victim on a dating site and made him intimate offers. At his home they filmed an intimate video, threatening to post it for the public, and afterwards drowned the victim in the bathtub.

actor1: Police Forces of Russia (2000-) Prison Guards
notes: Around 26 February 2018, an activist was tortured in a detention centre in Sevastopol. The man was put in jail for ten days for a social media post in connection to a case against a local anarchist. He stated that prison guards chocked him with a bag over his head, broke his finger, pulled his arms behind his back, pulled his trousers down and threatened to rape him.

actor1: NAF: United Armed Forces of Novorossiya
notes: On 23 February 2018, according to the victim's mother, members of DPR rebel militia raped and killed a girl in separatist-controlled Yenakijeve, Donetsk.
